about.details:
Jainam Ferro Alloys (I) Limited has been engaged in the manufacturing of two types of Ferro Alloys - Ferro Manganese (FeMn) and Silico manganese (SiMn), largely used in the Steel industry. The company also generates revenue from its trading activities of manganese ore, used as a raw material in the manufacturing of Ferro alloys.

The company derives the majority of its revenue from Ferro Manganese. The company has its registered office and manufacturing facility at Raipur, Chattisgarh.

Competitive Strengths

  • Adherence to ISO quality standards.
  • Experienced employees with technical expertise.
  • Ideal geographical location for easy access to laborers and raw material suppliers.
  • Focus on a long-term relationship with customers.
  • Strong experienced management.

faqs.question: What is the Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO?
faqs.answer:
Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO is a SME IPO of 2802000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹19.61 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹70 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 28, 2021, and closes on September 30, 2021.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO opens on September 28, 2021 and closes on September 30, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO?
faqs.answer: Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,40,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO will be done on Tuesday, October 5, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, October 7, 2021. Check the Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Jainam Ferro Alloys IPO listing date is on Friday, October 8, 2021.
